member.name: P:Brevitee.Data.Model.ModelActionMenu.MethodMarkerType
member.summary: The Attribute type that is marking the methods that will be runnable from this menu

member.name: P:Brevitee.Data.Model.CommandLineMenuInterface.MenuContextType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Type of the MenuContext to use. The default is ConsoleMenuContext

member.name: P:Brevitee.Data.Model.CommandLineMenuInterface.MenuWriterType
